Author: BCEDEXDEV
Title: [ANN][DEX] BCEDEX Exchange - Cryptocurrency exchange is managed by the community
Body: BCEDEX Exchange  - The first cryptocurrency exchange is managed by the community with own BCDX token  Official Website  http://www.bcedex.com  BCEDEX Wallet  http://www.bcedex.online   We are glad to announce officially the launch  of the BCEDEX Airdrop & Referral Bounty Campaign at Q4 2018!  Each member earns up to 16$ worth of tokens. (16000 BCDX for completing all the tasks)  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdEFcKnF-3lI6sUlhs9IG3-g01V2Ii-u-vuuLP1xroXHWHYww/viewform  BCEDEX Bounty Campaign  https://ibb.co/ceo2hq  BCEDEX is a community controlled exchange. Platform providing beginner and advanced traders, investors and institutions with a user-friendly crypto exchange that combines best practices by merging elements of centralised and decentralised trading platforms.  The community of BCDX owners actually owns BCEDEX. The development team of BCEDEX, as well as the use of intellectual contracts guarantee the implementation of decisions made by a majority of shareholders. The absence of mechanism that controls the entire system, transfers all powers to the shareholders of BCEDEX, which makes them the main force for our growth and development.  The community of BCDX owners has great potential in managing the BCEDEX exchange. Make decisions in listing and delisting of cryptocurrencies, create polls and new discussions in the community forum of topics of your interests. Take part in the development of BCEDEX as your own exchange. Earn more with the growing popularity of the BCEDEX exchange.          TOKEN SPECIFICATION  Token Name                BCEDEX Token Token Symbol              BCDX Token Standart            ERC-20 Total Token Supply      10.000.000.000 Token to be Offered     7.000.000.000 Price of Each Token      0.0000005 ETH Soft Cap                     2.500 ETH Hard Cap                    30.000 ETH               BCDX Token Contract https://etherscan.io/address/0xfe3f7e634f4e81793865d5af00b9688cd85a1d0d              BCEDEX ROADMAP  Q2 2018  Concept Delepment, Team Formation Q3 2018 Research and Development Q4 2018 Airdrop Compaign, Pre-Sale Round Q1 2019 Crowdsale Begins, Airdrop Distribution Q2 2019 Exchange and Coinmarketcap Listings Q3 2019 Release of BCEDEX Exchange Beta-Version Q4 2019 Release of BCEDEX Exchange Q1 2020 Mobile Application Launching

Title: [ANN][DEX] BCEDEX Exchange - Cryptocurrency exchange is managed by the community
Body: Hello. Our team had no facebook accouts before this project. We need accounts in the facebook for verification of the team on various ICO ratings. We are a new ambitious team of developers and friends who have not participated in any projects before this, I repeat, we are not famouse promoters and advertisers of various scam projects who only need to earn on ICO and disappear, we have no advertising experience, but we have a huge programming experience, we are set up in the first place turn to implement our project, regardless of the amount collected on ICO funds.
